prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Construct a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The prism is positioned diagonally from the top left to the bottom right corner of the image, and is slightly larger than the width of the hole. 1. **Create a new coordinate system** - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.7313, 0.0] 2. **Draw a 2D sketch on face_1 of the coordinate system** - Loop_1 containing 4 lines - line_1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.2344, 0.0] - line_2: Start Point [0.2344, 0.0], End Point [0.2344, 0.0187] - line_3: Start Point [0.2344, 0.0187], End Point [0.0, 0.0187] - line_4: Start Point [0.0, 0.0187], End Point [0.0, 0.0] 3. **Scale the 2D sketch with the scaling parameter 0.2344** 4. **Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the Euler angles and translation vector** 5. **Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model** - Extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.7313 - Extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0 - Sketch_scale: 0.2344 - Operation: Create a new solid body (NewBodyFeatureOperation) Part 2 Instructions Construct a three-dimensional geometric shape with a rectangular base and a triangular top. The shape is symmetrical and has a flat surface on the top. The rectangular base is placed on the top of the prism from Part 1, aligned with its width. 1. **Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters** - Euler Angles: [180.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.1406, 0.7313, 0.0] 2. **Draw a 2D sketch on face_1 of the coordinate system** - Loop_1 containing 4 lines - line_1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.0469, 0.0] - line_2: Start Point [0.0469, 0.0], End Point [0.0469, 0.0187] - line_3: Start Point [0.0469, 0.0187], End Point [0.0, 0.0187] - line_4: Start Point [0.0, 0.0187], End Point [0.0, 0.0] 3. **Scale the 2D sketch with the scaling parameter 0.0469** 4. **Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the Euler angles and translation vector** 5. **Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model** - Extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.0188 - Extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0 - Sketch_scale: 0.0469 - Operation: Join or add material to the existing prism (JoinFeatureOperation) dimensions of the prism are 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height, with a curved side having a radius of 0.5 units. The added rectangular prism, Part 1, has the following dimensions: 0.2344 units in length, 0.7313 units in width, and 0.2344 units in height. The triangular prism in Part 2 has dimensions of 0.0469 units in length, 0.0188 units in width, and 0.0469 units in height.</description>
